Title: Aankhen
Writer: Shobhana Desai (play), Aatish Kapadia (screenplay), Aatish Kapadia (story), Aatish Kapadia, Vipul Amrutlal Shah (screenplay), Vipul Amrutlal Shah (story)
Actors: Amitabh Bachchan, Akshay Kumar, Sushmita Sen, Arjun Rampal
Plot: After a temperamental man is unceremoniously stripped of his duties as a bank manager, he decides to seek revenge by robbing the bank. He trains three blind men to do this risky task for him.
